Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #6 buses will operate in both directions via 71st, Coles, 75th, and South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
#6 Jackson Park Express buses will operate in both directions via 71st, Coles, 75th, and South Shore.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to sewer construction on South Shore between 71st and 75th.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near South Shore/71st
ShortDescription: NB 26 South Shore Exp buses are temporarily rerouted via: South Shore, 75th, Coles, and 71st,  due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: South Shore, 75th, Coles, and 71st, due to, street blockage near South Shore/71st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
